title: 'Bison Calf Euhan' after 'Save 'by Yellowstone tourists'
subtitle: Park visitors with goodwill put a wheel in their car to keep it warm, but the guards couldn't reunite the animal with its herd.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The bison calves were given in Yellowstone National Park after the tourists put the goodwill in their car to keep it warm.
